channel.title: Need help with a special issue of teleblock
channel.description:
Is there a way to make teleblock work at a area?
an example could be if i wanted varrock bank to be an area where you cant teleport (not from book, commands or tabs) is that possible?
please help.. i hope some good java dude know what to do :)

item.title: Need help with a special issue of teleblock
item.dc:creator: @rafikd rafikd
item.description:
@rafikd wrote:

yea but not quite sure where to put the code

just tryed it and i get 2 errors

client.java:25706: not a statement
public boolean inNoTeleArea() { (absX >= 3221 && absX <= 3236 && absY >= 3399 &&
absY <= 3417) }
^
client.java:25706: ‘;’ expected
public boolean inNoTeleArea() { (absX >= 3221 && absX <= 3236 && absY >= 3399 &&
absY <= 3417) }

               ^

2 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!

any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a special issue of teleblock

like have you tested it? :p[/quote]Instead of him testing it, how about you? Your the one having the problem, and he gave you an answer.

item.title: Need help with a special issue of teleblock
item.dc:creator: @rafikd rafikd
item.description:
@rafikd wrote:

hmm yea well i think ill change the

(X1, Y1, X2, Y2)
to
(absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)

what do the rest of the moparscape community say?

would this work? :

if (player.isInArea(absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)) { player.canTeleport(false); }

?

Or something along those lines
